html:
5.29.19  12:30 am   In Stupid Song, I like the tune on the piano and, well, the song in general. Could you maybe make another song using similar notes?

     sure

5.28.19  11:52 pm   How do you do the things you want to do? How do you do the things you want to do with your life and not just think about them? How can I get things out of my head and into the world?

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

5.28.19  11:35 pm   when you talk about the 12 levels of suffering, are you referring to an unfinishable method of concentrating and working hard on a project?

     that is a specific response i have been using for when people are in a situation where there is something they really want to accomplish but they are having various inner conflicts about it. i try to illustrate as vividly as i can what it has felt like for me to have gone through this, and in some cases, still am

5.28.19  11:23 pm   do you need a shift or caps lock key

     no i have 2 shifts and 1 caps lock that are still in surprisingly great condition considering the wear and tear i have given them

5.28.19  11:08 pm   I've been thinking a lot about how I'm going to die eventually. At first I was kinda sad, but I warmed up to the idea! After all, I haven't been alive for the billions of years preceding my birth. And being not alive wasn't that bad.

The thing is, I'm going to be really disappointed when I do have to die. I don't want to say goodbye to all my life experiences - the things I've done, the things I want to do, the people I love. I'll never know the things people will discover in the far-off future.

Thinking about giving that all up makes me want to cry, honestly. I don't want to die. I really REALLY don't want to die!!!!

What are your thoughts on this? Any tips

     the best thing to focus on is the life you are in now

5.28.19  10:48 pm   i have seen two points.  one point arguing that destroying every particle in your body and then reforming it would kill the 'you' you but give birth to a new someone who is entirely you and to their knowledge everything continued as normal, but the 'you' you is really gone.  The other argument is that this new exact rearrangement of particles is you and would be the 'you' you and everything is fine.  I have a hard time with each one but i think i lean towards the idea that the 'you' you won't be there anymore more when it is reformed.  

     i think this automatically happens to all of us. there is a persistent rumor that says our entire bodies entirely regenerate themselves over the course of several years, implying that you are now a completely different physical body than the one you are born with

     i think this idea for some reason blends in with my thoughts about reincarnation.  i also think there are extra problems to the situation like, what if when your particles are reformed they form 2 or 3 copies?  

     that would be a mindfuck but we would probably all learn something

     then, if 'you' you are still around, which one is you?  are both you?  would it be like a clonal colony hive mind kind of thing?  that doesn't make sense to me and damages the argument that 'you' you would be around.  if everything is happening, perhaps what we are experiencing in this life happens infinite times.  if it does, do 'i' really get to experience that many times?  

     eventually

     it doesn't feel like that.  

     probably because the possibilities are so vast, it's probably impossible to imagine currently

     unless this is the first time and i am in for a big whopping surprise when i die.  these things have just been really burning into my brain.  any thoughts?  thanks for listening.  i hope the new video is bringing meaning and joy.

5.28.19  10:17 pm   why do some people feel the need to tell you their friends/parents/neighbors seconds cousins cat doesn't like your songs? i don't get it

     that sounds like a version of good cop bad cop, except with only one cop, trying to explain that there are bad cops somewhere

5.28.19  10:09 pm   Have you ever thought of writing a musical? 

     it almost seems like i've done quite a lot of that. at least, i know i've done the musical part, i've even gone so far as to do the non-musical part also

5.28.19  8:58 pm   i had plans for the future, but they have suddenly become impossible, and i feel lost and stuck. what should i do now?

     how about this

5.28.19  8:44 pm   Can we talk about how you deleted a huge list of song recommendations after like 1 day because someone didn't like some of them?

     that's not why

      I think that is unfair because some people don't like your music, but you don't delete that from the world. That would be crazy. This is how I feel about when you deleted your song recommendations after like 1 day because someone didn't like some of them.

     that's not the reason i deleted it. i deleted it because someone posted online a youtube playlist where they tried to put all those recommendations in a list. but the problem is, the versions shown in those videos did not match the versions i recommended. so it made it look like i was recommending those videos when i wasn't

5.28.19  8:39 pm   have you ever thought about how the questions page would be really boring without the purple text?

     i probably haven't thought about it since the time i first set the colors, but yes

5.28.19  8:33 pm   is answering these questions like scrablimng but instead of letter you do it with ideas

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.28.19  8:33 pm   how do i be right

     nothing is right

5.28.19  8:14 pm   you ever read about human longevity?  

     yes

      i wonder what your thoughts may be about it.

     it seems like happiness is an important element to living a long time. but everyone is different, i actually saw one example of a woman who lived an extremely long time and hated every minute of it, thought her longevity was some kind of punishment. so you never know

5.28.19  7:40 pm   Do you have any interest in doing regular artist things like performing concerts and/or selling records?

     i think i already do some of the most regular things an artist can do, this day and age

5.28.19  6:15 pm   do you create keyframe sets before you start editing a music video to plot in all the rhythms and stuff?

     no

5.28.19  6:09 pm   Do you read poetry,

     nowadays poetry is known by many more names than just poetry but yes

     cuz I always read your answers and think, wow, this man must read a lot of poetry (if so who's your favorite poet)

     usually someone different than before

5.28.19  5:49 pm   what makes something good

     what makes you think it's good

5.28.19  5:15 pm   Why am I sometimes randomly sad?

     to prepare for being happy at some point in the near future

5.28.19  5:14 pm   What is the most ridiculous thing you did?

     was born

5.28.19  5:09 pm   how do i get from the ocean to the moon

     it's just a hop skip and a jump

5.28.19  4:14 pm   what is your favorite holiday?

     1/1

5.28.19  3:06 pm   What's your most favorite video that you have made.

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.28.19  2:48 pm   what should my classes for next semester be?

     taught by you hopefully

5.28.19  2:18 pm   When you're not feeling motivated, what do you do to motivate yourself?

     it is the rest of the world that motivates me, so i try to move through it, in a sort of swimming fashion

5.28.19  12:43 pm   What would happen if the sun were to miraculously transform into an onion?

     armageddon

      Like if it was a hot, sunny day, and everything goes dark. You look up, and you just see the biggest onion ever where the sun once was. Would there be a daylight cycle?

     no

      Would all life on Earth perish?

     yes

      Would this have any major effect on the rest of the solar system?

     yes

     I'm genuinely curious.

5.28.19  12:39 pm   is cereal a soup or a salad?

     i think it's a hot dog

5.28.19  12:38 pm   where do lost people go when they're lost? is there a lost person place where they just go until they are found?

     unfamiliar territory

5.28.19  12:11 pm   Hi Bill, I am expecting that your next video is going to be great because all this time you're taking for editing it. Is it true?

     oh, sure

5.28.19  11:54 am   How far are you into your next video

     about 2 months

5.28.19  11:13 am   why do tank tops/sleeveless shirts gross me out so much?

     it is probably the shoulders / upper arms which you don't like

5.28.19  11:09 am   Have ever you shown any of your work to relatives or friends?

     not usually

      What did they think of it?

     it's impossible to know for sure

     there

5.28.19  10:33 am   What are memes?

     they are the building blocks of society

5.28.19  9:06 am   How do you feel about New Jersey?

     pretty good

5.28.19  8:59 am   What percentage of the new video is complete?

     0

5.28.19  8:38 am   How to beat around the bush?

     the hardest part is deciding which side

5.28.19  7:22 am   would you consider recording a song without a click

     maybe but only if all the instruments are recorded at the same time

5.28.19  5:09 am   any chance "you're free to do whatever you want to" can go on iTunes?

     i think so

      It's my second favorite song for sewing, eclipsed for that purpose only by "hello sexy pants" and it'd be great to have them on the same playlist.

Hope all's well where you are!

5.28.19  2:48 am   i've been on a devastatingly long break from creating music (6 months at least), and it's absolutely killing me. i just lost it at the height of my career because of an insane amount of pressure (self-inflicted, mostly) to sound good and be an amazing pianist. also, i've been traveling this week and i'm staying in a house with a few other musicians. tonight i heard someone basically hitting the keys and playing with some cute chords, no recording or end goal or anything, just spending time with the instrument. and it filled me with relief and determination. because i guess ive been waaay too much of a perfectionist- and i've been too afraid to make mistakes while playing, to the point of deleting my confidence to even play. but, if this person can just hit some keys at 2 am and still manage to get some enjoyment and meaning from it, fuck what the hell am i holding back for? i forgot why i even fell in love with music: what the fuck is music and how can i make it myself

     just put the same amount of energy into the music that you put into writing this. but on the other hand don't forget about writing too, because it seems clear that you already have a lot of energy for that too

5.28.19  2:13 am   in your La dee da day oh song thing (which is amazin' btw) do the lyrics just got home, got no home la-dee-da-de where did it go oh no i can't go home mean like, so you like a girl right, but to get to her (or something) you needa be a rebel against your parents or something XD and you end up getting to her, and a full fulfillment of actually being able to listen to La de Da de Da de Da de Day Oh happily with the good times being now, but you can't get back to your home or whatever cuz/but you got to this girl.

     that could work

     i suck at finding lyric meanings to songz so ya xD you tell me bill

     my part is done, that's the way i made it. the rest is in your hands

5.28.19  12:29 am   why am I seeing things that are being answered 2am in the morning?

     the questions may have been answered any time. there is really no way for you to tell what time a question was answered, that information is not provided here

      bill are you okay

     yes are you

5.28.19  12:26 am   How to not feel like dying 

     movement and motion is recommended

5.27.19  11:40 pm   how would you voice that Ebadd4/C chord?

     C65, G196, Ab208, Bb233, Eb311

     cause it's got all the same notes as Absus2maj7/C, but i presume you didn't write it that way for a reason

     shorter to write (but still frighteningly long). actually i have my own symbol that i prefer for that (it's this) because Ebadd4/C and Absus2maj7/C and Abmaj9(no3) and Cmin7addb6 are all frighteningly long. i chose one of those 4 because other people are not familiar with the star, and i chose the shortest one of the 4. beyond that there is no difference to me, and any further specifications would have to be made with exact notation or consulting the writer

5.27.19  11:40 pm   what's a good story about a girl?

     alice in wonderland

5.27.19  11:32 pm   just interested: how long did it take you to write that "write it by hand" jingle you posted?

     a minute or so

      did you even have to touch an instrument?

     would have been convenient, but i am in green screen mode right now which means the keyboard is put away to allow access to the desk area. had to use my imagination

     you're practically fluent in Jingle at this point

5.27.19  11:01 pm   how did you figure out time

     you have to take a cold hard look in the mirror

5.27.19  10:58 pm   A few examples of good music videos please, Mr. Wurtz?

     the opening skateboard scene in back to the future (power of love), 'times like these' by foo fighters the UK version with the instruments and kaleidescope backgrounds NOT the one with the bridge and storytelling. and preferably with better syncing than the 2009 youtube upload, jeez

5.27.19  9:48 pm   So I'm curious. There's sort of a debate on whether your "I don't wanna go to school song" is an anti-school song or a song criticizing people who refuse to go to school, or whether it's just random lyrics.

     neither

5.27.19  9:40 pm   will there ever be a follow-up to wfaoie?

     yes
